```{r}
Drug_Mortality %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_bar(aes(x = State,  y = Deaths), 
           stat = "identity",
           fill = "firebrick",
           alpha = 0.5    )+
  labs(
    title = "Drug Poisoning Deaths in the United States",
    subtitle = "By state",
    x = "State",
    y = "Deaths"
  )+
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1))

```
